languages.text: Согласно Мастеру вокса, ксеносы стремились попасть именно в это помещение. Рекомендуется внимательное изучение обстановки с целью выявления причины такого поведения.
According to the Vox Master, the xenos were trying to reach this very room. It would be worth exploring the area in detail to determine the reason for their actions.
languages.original_text: Согласно Мастеру вокса, ксеносы стремились попасть именно в это помещение. Рекомендуется внимательное изучение обстановки с целью выявления причины такого поведения.

traits.locale_text: According to the Vox Master, the xenos were trying to reach this very room. It would be worth exploring the area in detail to determine the reason for their actions.
According to the Vox Master, the xenos were trying to reach this very room. It would be worth exploring the area in detail to determine the reason for their actions.
According to the Vox Master, the xenos were trying to reach this very room. It would be worth exploring the area in detail to determine the reason for their actions.
According to the Vox Master, the xenos were trying to reach this very room. It would be worth exploring the area in detail to determine the reason for their actions.

languages.text: 根据音阵大师的报告，异形正打算冲往这个房间。行商浪人应该仔细探查这片区域，弄清异形为什么打算前往此处。
languages.original_text: According to the Vox Master, the xenos were trying to reach this very room. It would be worth exploring the area in detail to determine the reason for their actions.

traits.locale_text: 根据音阵大师的报告，异形正打算冲往这个房间。行商浪人应该仔细探查这片区域，弄清异形为什么打算前往此处。

languages.text: ヴォクス・マスターによれば、異種族はまさにこの部屋を目指していたようだ。奴らの行動の理由を特定すべく、詳しく調べる価値がある。
languages.original_text: According to the Vox Master, the xenos were trying to reach this very room. It would be worth exploring the area in detail to determine the reason for their actions.

traits.locale_text: ヴォクス・マスターによれば、異種族はまさにこの部屋を目指していたようだ。奴らの行動の理由を特定すべく、詳しく調べる価値がある。

languages.text: Según la maestra de vocos, los xenos estaban intentando llegar a esta misma sala. Merece la pena explorarla con atención para descubrir por qué.
languages.original_text: According to the Vox Master, the xenos were trying to reach this very room. It would be worth exploring the area in detail to determine the reason for their actions.

traits.locale_text: Según la maestra de vocos, los xenos estaban intentando llegar a esta misma sala. Merece la pena explorarla con atención para descubrir por qué.

languages.text: Der Voxmeisterin zufolge wollten die Xenos in diesen Raum eindringen. Du solltest den Bereich eingehend untersuchen, um den Grund für ihr Handeln zu ermitteln.
languages.original_text: According to the Vox Master, the xenos were trying to reach this very room. It would be worth exploring the area in detail to determine the reason for their actions.

traits.locale_text: Der Voxmeisterin zufolge wollten die Xenos in diesen Raum eindringen. Du solltest den Bereich eingehend untersuchen, um den Grund für ihr Handeln zu ermitteln.

languages.text: D'après la maîtresse-vox, les xénos essaient d'atteindre cette salle. Il pourrait être judicieux d'explorer la zone minutieusement pour déterminer les raisons de leurs actions.
languages.original_text: According to the Vox Master, the xenos were trying to reach this very room. It would be worth exploring the area in detail to determine the reason for their actions.

traits.locale_text: D'après la maîtresse-vox, les xénos essaient d'atteindre cette salle. Il pourrait être judicieux d'explorer la zone minutieusement pour déterminer les raisons de leurs actions.

languages.text: Voks Üstadı'na göre zenolar, bu odaya ulaşmaya çalışıyormuş. Eylemlerinin nedenlerini anlayabilmek için civarı araştırmak mantıklı olacaktır.
languages.original_text: According to the Vox Master, the xenos were trying to reach this very room. It would be worth exploring the area in detail to determine the reason for their actions.

traits.locale_text: Voks Üstadı'na göre zenolar bu odaya ulaşmaya çalışıyorlarmış. Eylemlerinin nedenlerini anlayabilmek için bölgeyi araştırmak mantıklı olacaktır.
